## Installation

`{reluxr}` relies upon the utility package `{wellr}`, to install both, run the
code below:

``` r
#install.packages("remotes")

remotes::install_github("rforbiochemists/wellr")
remotes::install_github("bradyajohnston/reluxr")
```
